phrases: I would forgotten one crucial thing...
It is I... who am always... being protected!
It is not One, but Many!
A side effect of the Lost Magic, you see.
It seems I overused it considerably...
Everyone is magic power will be returned to them.
Do you know a man by the name of Jellal?
He lost his mind after supposedly being possessed by the ghost of Zeref.
A tragic man who traverses a life of nothingness.
He was someone you held dear?
I believe that was all the work of Ultear.
I heard it was an 8-year plan to have the Magic Council turn a blind eye to our actions at the time.
Master Hades trusts her more than anyone.
Why are you so fixated on searching for Zeref?
The magic at the beginning of the world...
To get closer to the One Magic.
And what happens when you get there?
Power is welling up within me!
My body is filling with magic power.
Anyway, it seems like our magic power is back to normal.
Maybe Carla and the others are late getting here because of what happened?
Their magic power is back to normal!
With even Gildarts here losing his magic power...
He is not even a match for me...
As a proctor of this exam, it are not dignified for me to take a beating like this.
I got to put on a good show in front of those kids!
Let us have a fight where we can fly even higher!
How about we fight seriously now?
An infinite gravity well that sucks in everything!
Blast these foolish Fairies with all that sadness, and return them to dust!
I do not have a choice.
I will use my Figure Eyes.
But it will not work on someone with glasses...
There is a man I can count on with his eyes wide open!
I will be controlling you for a bit!
If you want to fly so bad, how about I send you flying?
You broke my spell to pieces?
Looks like your magic power is back to normal...
You are free to believe me or not...
I am taking Zeref and leaving this island.
With Ul's spell, Iced She Will, you should be able to defeat him.
You are the only one who can carry out what Ul and I have wished for!
It is like that weakness from before was just some bad dream...
Just'because things are a little easier, it is not like we are fully recovered...
Natsu, do not you think you are going a little fast?
I have to think of Gramps here!
And I will not know what is happened to everyone else unless we get back to the camp!
I am so hungry I cannot walk!
You do understand the situation we are in when you said that, right?
Like they say, care killed the cat.
The only thing I ate was the fire from that God Slayer,
and then I beat the crap out of him...
Cana's heavier than you would think...
Cana's unconscious, but that is still a terrible thing to say...
I was curious, so I climbed way up high.
The giant tree growing on the island has collapsed down to the roots!
Then that means the felling of the tree was the because of our magic power drying up?
It is called the Tenrou Tree.
I hear it gives divine protection to those in the guild.
I do not know the details, but anyone who is got a Fairy Tail mark cannot die or something.
Then that is why all the injured people made it.
But then, why did our magic power return?
Then, we must stay on our guard while our magic power recovers...
Iced She Will requires the caster to give up their life...
This is not for you, or for Ul.
I will use healing magic right away!
I appreciate the offer, but look at how many...
You have been using magic all day.
You have to rest a little, or else...
After that, for some unknown reason, our magic power suddenly disappeared.
It was a close call, but Fried and Bickslow fought for us.
But even before that, everyone had already been injured here and there...
It is gotten so dire without me even realizing it!
The cheerful characters like us cannot cry!
So even the Master and Cana are casualties...
What the hell's going on here?
The Grimoire Heart battleship is anchored off to the east.
Considering we need to defend this camp, how about splitting into two teams?
One attack team, and one defense team?
We are leaving this island like this.
B-But, I have not found Gray yet.
What does Zeref have to do with Ul's wishes?
My father was killed by Hades.
In order to get revenge, Ul chased after Grimoire Heart behind the scenes.
After Ul's death, I found her diary and learned the truth.
In order to get revenge, I infiltrated Grimoire Heart.
But, Hades's magic power was beyond anything I could imagine.
Ul knew this, which is why she mastered Iced She Will.
I was not able to master it.
Even though Ul's blood runs through my veins...
The only magic I know of right now that can defeat Hades is Iced She Will.
I will seal him away, outside this island,
so that no one will ever find him again.
I am not handing him over to Hades!
Please, you are the only one who can carry out what Ul and I have wished for!
He actually bought that story I came up with on the spot?
If this goes well, then Hades and Gray will off each other!
I could not think of anything better!
You are going to trick Master Hades?
Everyone should just dance in the palm of my hand...
I am not handing Zeref over to anyone!
I really should not put so much confidence in Gray.
But he should at least serve to distract Hades.
Let us leave the island before he catches on.
I am going to kill her, obviously.
But, she cannot fight any more...
I will not let Gray have even a hint of a future.
He will be destroyed by Hades, or die from Iced She Will.
Or even if you manage to survive, you will have lost your precious friend!
I never believed a damn thing you said!
So, you pretended to believe me in order to find out my true aim...
I have decided never to use that magic again!
I stopped you before'because I did not want you to die.
Maybe I did not get through to you?
I am going to continue living, along with my friends!
I guess you are not such a good boy after all.
I had hoped you would get lucky and get rid of Hades for me...
Honestly, I really did not want to fight you.
After all, you are one of that woman's beloved pupils...
You have chosen the most painful way to die, you know!
I am going to teach you a lesson in your mother's place!
You have made one big mistake.
I am the leader of the 7 Kin of Purgatory!
You do not stand a chance against me!
We have beaten all the enemies around for now...
Time to take on the bossman!
Sorry to kill your buzz, but you hardly show up next episode.
The main character does not show up?
That is because you are only just barely the main character, Natsu.
Next episode, I am the main character!
Jealousy does not become you, Natsu...
But seriously, I did not see a shot with you in the preview...
